snippet.title: Pioneers of Pagonia: In-Game Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We are beyond excited to share the first in-game trailer of our city builder Pioneers of Pagonia with you! Let us know in the comments which part you are most excited about!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2155180/Pioneers_of_Pagonia/

Available for Early Access by the end of 2023!

Find out more: https://www.pioneersofpagonia.com 

Join our Discord here: https://discord.gg/3ADebJKENC 

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pioneersofpagonia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pagoniagame
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pioneersofpagonia
Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pioneersofpagonia

Pioneers of Pagonia is all about exploration, discovery, and reuniting the fantastical islands of Pagonia. Build over 40 different buildings, use more than 70 different types of goods, manage widely branched production chains, and get creative in establishing your economy. 

#pioneersofpagonia #pagonia #citybuilder #gamesförderung
